discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Sɔnsig lakirin la]] anɛ zin'ikanɛ ka ti na ka nwɛ' taaba saawara ka li sʋŋ ka ti sɔb la  {{SITENAME}} an sʋ'ʋm woo din nar si'em. Fʋ tun'e dɔlis lakirin nwa sɔns nɛ fʋ taaba yanamɛ na niŋ si'em ka ya sɔb la an sʋ'ʋŋa [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self: Pʋ'ʋsim tisidif fʋ pian'ʋk lakir zin'ig
discussiontools-emptystate-title-self-an: Pi'ant ƒal kaŋa titiƒ ken ken
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Bɛllimnɛ maligim din'lɛm maki gɔs la
discussiontools-findcomment-results-id: lɛbisʋg nɛ li ID la ni'eya dɔlisʋg {{PLURAL:$1|page|pages}} la ni.
discussiontools-findcomment-results-name: lɛbisʋg nɛ li yʋ'ʋr tisib ni'eya dɔlisʋg {{PLURAL:$1|zug lakir|pages}}: la ni.
discussiontools-ledesection-button: Zamisim pamm zaŋi kin zug lakir nwa.
discussiontools-limitreport-errorreqid: Sɔsʋg la'ad nam gbeligir bu'os ID
discussiontools-notification-removed-top: {{PLURAL:$1|yɛlzug yinne da anɛ|$1 yɛlzut daa anɛ|100=99+ topics were}} su'a bɛɛ isidi nyi $2.
Basim di'esid tɛn'ɛsa wʋʋ nwa nɛ
discussiontools-notification-subscribed-: {{PLURAL:$1|One new reply|$1 new replies|100=99+ new replies}} bɛ "$3" ni.
discussiontools-pageframe-latestcomment: Lɛbisʋg paal: $1 ka $2 niŋ yɛlzug ni $3
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub: Siaki kpe' yɛlzutin la ba mɛŋ
discussiontools-preference-gadget-confli: Fʋ ya'a bɔɔd ye suor bɛ tis tɔ'tɔ lɛbisʋgɔ, yiiga fʋ nar ye fʋ [[$1|disable the Convenient Discussions gadget]] fʋ la'ad bɔɔdim nam ni.
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool: Basim suori tis tɔ'tɔ yɛlzug paasʋg
discussiontools-preference-newtopictool-: M ya.a kaae sɔsʋg lakir linɛ ka ba nan pʋ ya'abɛ:
Nwa na bigisif paalʋ suorin tis yɛlzug paal paasʋg,
discussiontools-preference-replytool-hel: Nwa na bigisif nwiig ka fʋ lɛbis pian'ad lakir lɛbisa si'isʋg yinne ni.
discussiontools-preference-sourcemodetoo: Basim suori tis dɛmisʋg la'ad ziesim yiib ni
Nwa na paas 'toolbar' tis tɔ'tɔ lɛbisʋg la nɛ tɔ'tɔ yɛlzug ziesa nam paasʋg suor ziesa banɛ mɔr suo-gima tis 'pinging' ka paasid nwiis.
discussiontools-preference-summary: Fʋ tɔn'ɛ zamisi zaŋi keŋ ziesa bama dɔl nɛ karimig la [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Talk_pages_project/Feature_summary feature summary].
discussiontools-preference-topicsubscrip: Nwa na tisif suor ka fʋ si'aki kpe' ye fʋ di'e tɛn'ɛsa zaŋi keŋ lɛbisa zaŋi keŋ nidid wusa yɛlzutin.
discussiontools-preference-visualenhance: Nwa na sʋŋ lakir pian'ad paal nɛɛnsim linɛ na paas labaar zaŋi tʋʋma sɔnsʋg wusa pʋʋgin
discussiontools-replywidget-anon-warning: fʋ pʋ n yɔɔgɛ. Ye fʋ nye' tɛ'ɛnsʋg sɔ ya'a lɛbis ka di'e 'attribution' nɛ fʋ yʋ'ʋr ka ka'a fu IP zin'is la, fʋ tɔn'ɛ [$1 log in] bɛɛ [$2 create an account].
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Fʋ lɛbisʋg na kpe' si'eni bɛ [[$1]].
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: Pʋ nye lɛbisʋg nwaa. Li tɔn'ɛ n saae bɛɛ tɔɔm zin'ig.
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Pʋ nye lɛbisʋg paalɛ. Ba tɔn'ɛ saae bɛɛ tɔɔm zin'ig.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: Ye fʋ yisimi fʋ mɛŋi nyi yɛlzug nwa nii?
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: Sakir kpe' la n zieni tis 'URL' la pʋ bɛɛ.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: Fʋ na nyɛ labaya banɛ ka nidib lɛbisi zaŋi ken pian'azug kaŋa nwa.
Fʋ kʋ lɛn nyɛ labaya yit nidibi lɛbisid si'em zaŋi ken pian'azug nwa nii.
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Lakir pian'ad lɛbisʋg paas ya dɛmisʋg nwa ni
tag-discussiontools-description: Maal dɛmisʋg tʋm nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Tʋm-tʋm dɛmisid lɛbisʋg kanɛ pʋn dɛŋi bɛ nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Tʋm-tʋm paas yɛlzug paali niŋ lakir la ni nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Tʋm-tʋm lɛbis ya tis lɛbisʋg nɛ sɔsʋg la'ad
tag-discussiontools-source-description: Sɔsʋg la'ad bɛɛn ziesim yiib zin'igin
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc: Sɔsʋg la'ad bɛɛn tiensʋg yiib zin'ig ziesim nɛ 'toolbar' la
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: Sɔsʋg la'ad paa bɛɛn nɛ gɔtiŋin ziesim
